## User Story

<!-- Complete these three key phrases: "as a...", "I want..." and "so that..." -->

**As a** [type of user e.g. `analyst` or `project lead` or `client`],
**I want** [`to visualise...` or `...to happen when...`],  
**So that** [benefit or value].

## Acceptance Criteria

<!-- How do we know when the story is complete? Examples for visualization of model results: -->

<!-- 
- [ ] The chart displays all time series data from the model output file
- [ ] Users can toggle between different scenarios on the same chart
- [ ] The visualization loads within 3 seconds for datasets up to 10,000 data points
- [ ] Color schemes are accessible and meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards
- [ ] Users can export the visualization as PNG, SVG, or PDF formats
- [ ] The chart includes proper axis labels, units, and a legend
- [ ] Tooltips display detailed information when hovering over data points
- [ ] The visualization is responsive and works on screens from 1024px to 4K resolution
- [ ] Users can zoom and pan to explore specific time periods or regions
- [ ] Missing or invalid data is clearly indicated on the chart
-->
